metadata.title: CVE-2021-40943 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In Bento4 1.6.0-638, there is a null pointer reference in the functionAP4_DescriptorListInspector::Action function in Ap4Descriptor.h:124 , asdemonstrated by GPAC. This can cause a denial of service (DOS).

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
